thread.title: First Dates: The worst chat from each date, and an awkward stand-off over the bill
thread.title_full: First Dates: The worst chat from each date, and an awkward stand-off over the bill

title: First Dates: The worst chat from each date, and an awkward stand-off over the bill
text:
‚Äî Dan Kiely (@kiely85) October 15, 2015 
And Fran, for some reason, seemed intent on pretending to be as posh as him (even though we‚Äôd already met her twin and she clearly wasn‚Äôt). Why is that twin putting on a fake posh accent? Wonder if hair ended up in his food from the over egg'd hair flicks üòÅ #firstdates #awks 
‚Äî Lisa M M (@LisaMayle) October 15, 2015 Promoted stories 
Worst chat 
Now you might have noticed, Hugo looks a lot like Spencer Matthews from Made In Chelsea. But Hugo thinks he looks much more like Buzz Lightyear. He‚Äôs even perfected ‚Äúthe Buzz face‚Äù. BUZZ LIGHTYEAR FACE!! Bluddy hilarious hahaha #FirstDates 
‚Äî Lauren Teague (@LilGirlGK) October 15, 2015 
Which led to the worst chat of their date, when Hugo asked if Francesca liked some ‚Äútoy action‚Äù. Buzz light year‚Ä¶a bit of toy action #firstdates 
‚Äî James Kirtland (@CurlySoccerAM) October 15, 2015 Imagine thinking of Buzz Lightyear during sex? #FirstDates 
‚Äî Ken Shabby (@MrKenShabby) October 15, 2015 
Another date? 
But in the back room Hugo was quick to admit he didn‚Äôt really fancy poor Fran, which she agreed with, naturally‚Ä¶ only we weren‚Äôt sure she wasn‚Äôt telling porkies. Oh my, that girl just got served on First Dates. I'm sure there were public executions that were less brutal. Cold Hugo. Cold #firstdates 
‚Äî James Doherty (@James_Doherty) October 15, 2015 Claudia and Marcus (Channel 4) 
Meanwhile, the other twin got landed with an absolutely lovely bloke called Marcus. And the pair of them seemed such a match! Marcus & Claudia, so cute ‚ù§. How every first date should start! Smiley and coy and lots of eye contact 
Worst chat 
Claudia went for the most terrible of all icebreakers ‚Äì the classic ‚Äúheritage‚Äù question. 'What's your‚Ä¶ Heritage?' 
However, when we found out we couldn‚Äôt help but be glad Claudia asked. #firstdates wow what a mix !!! Half Nigerian half Greek
